mapper.select: SELECT T1.ID, T1.REAL_NAME, T1.SEX, T1.BIRTHDAY, T1.TELEPHONE, T1.EMAIL, T1.QQ, T1.WX, T1.WEI_BO, T1.PHOTO, T1.LEVEL, T1.STATUS, T1.CREATOR, T1.CREATED, T1.MODIFIER, T1.MODIFIED, T1.VERSION, T1.CORPORATION_ID, T1.ORGANIZATION_ID, T2.NAME AS CORPORATION_ID, T3.NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME FROM mdc_user T1 INNER JOIN mdc_corporation T2 ON T1.CORPORATION_ID = T2.ID AND T2.STATUS = 1 INNER JOIN mdc_organization T3 ON T1.ORGANIZATION_ID = T3.ID AND T3.STATUS = 1 WHERE T1.ID = #{id} AND T1.STATUS = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mdc_user( ID, REAL_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WX, WEI_BO, PHOTO, LEVEL,
CORPORATION_ID,
ORGANIZATION_ID,
STATUS, CREATOR, CREATED, MODIFIER, MODIFIED, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{realName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{qq}, #{wx}, #{weiBo}, #{photo}, #{level},
#{corporation.id},
#{organization.id},
#{status}, #{creator}, now(), #{modifier}, now(), #{version} );
